alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 30 at 4:18PM CDT until October 31 at 9:34AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Minor flooding of farm and ranch land is expected near the river. A few rural roads will be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 32.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.8 feet early Saturday afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
